bug.author: kaka11chen
bug.summary: No response when click 'Spawn' button on creating notebook servers.
bug.description: I installed the kubeflow release v0.5.0 successfully. But when I access the web ui to create a notebook server, there is no response when click 'Spawn' button on creating notebook servers. From the jupyter-web-app logs, it returned http 400 status code. Then I found jupyter-web-app in kubeflow release v0.5.0 used 'latest' version. I guess the image which is 'latest' version I pulled is change something, then I modified the version to jupyter-web-app:v0.5.0, it works.

comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label kind/bug to this issue, with a confidence of 0.66. Please mark this comment with üëç or üëé to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/kubeflow/kubeflow>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/kaka11chen>@kaka11chen</denchmark-link> From code, it looks like branch v0.5.0 points to the right image. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/blob/v0.5.0/kubeflow/jupyter/prototypes/jupyter-web-app.jsonnet#L5>https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/blob/v0.5.0/kubeflow/jupyter/prototypes/jupyter-web-app.jsonnet#L5</denchmark-link>
Can you please let me know how did you deploy your Kubeflow cluster?

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/kaka11chen>@kaka11chen</denchmark-link> Thanks. Will take a look why latest image is picked up in your cluster. Meanwhile created a pr to set the image in master to a stable image <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/pull/3177>#3177</denchmark-link>

i think kfctl 0.5.0 still deploys master by default <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kunmingg>@kunmingg</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/gabrielwen>@gabrielwen</denchmark-link> . We are fixing that. In the meantime, if you pass --version=v0.5.0 when kctl init, it should be 0.5
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/lluunn>@lluunn</denchmark-link> That's correct. I tried to pass --version=v0.5.0 when , then the version is v0.5.0.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/kaka11chen>@kaka11chen</denchmark-link> Did setting fix it for you?
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/pull/3170>#3170</denchmark-link> changes v0.5 default to v0.5.0. could someone with write access update releases?
